column4: maba wo ture mu oo: Matsetsew eduhuam mɛɛr aka m'eduhuam ho; Medzi mo wokyɛm aka mo wo ho; Manom me nsa aka m'enumfonsu ho. Mfɛfo e

column3: na m'akoma nyanee: Mo dɔfo a ɔrobɔ mu ne ndze a
column9: bue me ɛ: Na bɔw atɔ me tsir do ma
column10: Anadwe bɔw ayɛ me mpɛsɛw ma."

column2: "Mapɔr m'atar; meyɛ dɛn mehyɛ? Mahohor m'anan ho; meyɛ dɛn mugu ho fi?"
"Mo dɔfo tseen ne nsa duaa abow no tokura no mu
column3: Na me yamu hyehyee me maa no."

column2: "Mosoɛɛr dɛ murukobue mo dɔfo; Na me nsa ho sosɔɔw eduhuam mɛɛr
column3: Na me nsatseaba sosɔɔw eduhuam mɛɛr a ɔanan

column2: "Mubuei maa mo dɔfo; Nna mo dɔfo atwe noho
column3: na ɔkɔ. Ber a ɔkasae no

column2: "Aweɔmfo a wokyin kurow no ho no hun me
column4: wopirapiraa me. Afasu no ho ahwɛfo no yii me nkataenyim kɔree."

column3: meka ntam gu hom do dɛ sɛ hom hu mo dɔfo no a
column4: Ɔno hom nse no dɛ ɔdɔ yarba abɔ me."

column2: "Adze bɛn na wo dɔfo dze sen ɔdɔfo bi
column3: Ɔwo mbaa mu ɔhoɔfɛfo kɛse? Adze bɛn na wo dɔfo dze sen ɔdɔfo bi
column4: Na ɔwo ka ntam gu hɛn do dɛm yi?"

column2: "Ne tsir tse dɛ sika pa mapa
"N'enyiwamba tse dɛ esutsen ho mbubur; Wɔdze numfonsu ahohor

column3: dɛ nduadzewa dɛɛdɛw a wɔahohɔr isiw. N'anofamfa tse dɛ esukookoo a ɔsosɔw eduhuam mɛɛr nanee."

column2: "Ne nsa tse dɛ sika mpɛtsea a wɔdze sikabereebo esisi do: Ne nyimpadua tse dɛ asombɛn edwindzi a wɔdze hoabo edura ho."
"No ntwɛr tse dɛ abo fitaa edum a osisi sika pa ngyinado do: No suban tse dɛ Lebanon

column3: no ho nyinara yɛ akɔndɔ. Mo dɔfo no nye yi
column4: na me nyɛnko no nye yi
